statements: DELETE FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0;
DELETE FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND data_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM navigation_routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM navigation_routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND distance > 100;
DELETE FROM mapping_data WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM waypoints WHERE route_id = 3 AND waypoint_order > 5;
DELETE FROM waypoints WHERE route_id = 1 AND waypoint_order > 3;
